thread.title: Great hotel in New York -
thread.title_full: Great hotel in New York - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LPSTP
title: Great hotel in New York -
text:
I Spent the better part of this past week at the Homewood Suites on West 37th Street while attending a trade show at the Javits Center a couple blocks away. Easy, quick, early check-in. Room was a great size for NYC and I enjoyed having a small kitchen for early coffee before breakfast. Room was exceptional clean and had a wood-grained tile floor and not questionable carpeting. Asked for a quiet room and was assigned one at the back of the building and although the room backed up to an elevator, I DID NOT hear it until we had a very windy day, and the wind could be heard in the elevator shaft a bit at night. Their breakfast buffet comes with the room ( and didn't cost an additional $25-35 as in some bigger name hotels in town) and was greatly appreciated. Nothing out of the ordinary, but decent, fresh, nourishing food with enough selection for anyone's taste. Also offered walk-away fruit to enjoy later in the morning along with cookies in the lobby in the afternoon. Staff was friendly and accommodating. I would definitely recommend this Homewood Suites for anyone that needs a home away from home while in New York City. Thanks Homewood Suites for a great stay!
Green Features: Like many hotels, they offer you a choice of changing bed and bath linens daily or on-demand.
